page.title: 08Uniform at Sandown School
page.content: {Boys ( by Stuart Botley) We wear uniforms to school.I wear a white shirt with button up cuffs,and buttons down the middle.The jumper is sleeveless and is grey.My tie is maroon,with diagonal stripes.I wear short trousers with a zip.They come down to your thighs.My clothes are mostly made out of polyester & wool.I wear grey socks that come up to my knees & are held up by elastic.My shoes are grey too & are leather. {Girls (by Sara Geater) I wear a white shirt with long sleeves and a small collar.The tie is maroon with diagonal lines on it and it is made out of man made fibre.My jumper is made out of wool.I have a skirt which is grey and is about knee length.I wear white long socks and maroon shoes with rounded toes.
